title: Good riddance
author: VD
content_html: It’s hard to imagine anyone, on either side, lamenting David Souter’s retirement. And it’s telling how few Republicans are even bothering trying to pretend that McCain’s appointment would have been conservative; I will be personally disappointed if Obama doesn’t name a black lesbian Muslim to the Supreme Court. From Kenya.
content_text:
It’s hard to imagine anyone, on either side, lamenting
David Souter’s retirement
.  And it’s telling how few Republicans are even bothering trying to pretend that McCain’s appointment would have been conservative; I will be personally disappointed if Obama doesn’t name a black lesbian Muslim to the Supreme Court.  From Kenya.
